extendedInfo.description: This app enables a user to inform their current location with their family members. The user can also update their current location to friends with full current address information on a minute by minute basis using GPS data. Features~~~~~~~ Real time tracking [Track anything - car, person, baby, any vehicle, etc,...]~ Email current location~ SMS current location~ Real time speed warning~ Real time traffic~ Speedometer enabled~ Altimeter enabled~ Map search~ World weather information~ Person search~ Places search~ Distance between places~ Route between places~ Tap the map instead of typingDescription ~~~~~~~~If you just keep your smart phone (with this app installed) in your car, then you can also get updated about the position of your car on a minute by minute basis through email. It can also help you to track your phone / car, when it is stolen. You can also track your child's location without any problem, and thus ensures you a very safe journey, and a safe baby sitting.The app also allows to find the path between the source, and the destination. It also shows the distance to the destination, the speed of the car, the altitude in which you are flying in case of the flight travel.The app also has the over speed warning facility which allows the user to get alarmed when they are over speeding beyond a limit. The app also provides you the complete weather details and, real time traffic information.The app also helps you to search for any places, tourist spots, hotels, doctors, and many other significant search information associated with any location, and much more.This app also allows you to email your current location to your friends. The user can also SMS their location to the other users. Regards,Smart Travel Map teamEmail:~~~~contact@smarttravelmap.mygbiz.comgurunathants@gmail.com

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I just wish it would save your information
reviews.author: wayne gardner

reviews.title: Wonderful tracking app
reviews.comment: Location Tracking through email very fantastic. Must for group travel
reviews.author: Guru Nath
